title: Analysis of Student Engagement Changes and Improvement Strategies Based on Flipped Learning in Hybrid Learning Environments at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics knowledge and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Project-based mathematics education for current practitioners, incorporating a hybrid learning environment using personal devices

learning_goals: Student engagement patterns can be quantified using Learning Management System (LMS) data.
Learning path changes can be detected and interpreted by applying process mining techniques.
Personalized learning intervention strategies can be designed based on analytical results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
